resources.string: An updated version of File Manager is now available. Do you want to update now?
"Here\'s the major update you shouldn\'t miss."
"Customizable home panel: Now you can customize your home panel with different categories and orders."
"Favorite picker: Add favorite folder directly from favorite category."
"File manager widget: Create a folder shortcut on Launcher."
